properties.comment: 所有多表操作sql,key名称不能变
properties.entry: replace into pushworks_trace value(0,0,?)
SELECT * FROM pushworks_trace WHERE work_id = 0 for update
SELECT sw.cover_url as thumb , sw.work_name as name , sw.work_link as url , so.uid as uid FROM service_work sw inner join service_order so on sw.order_id = so.order_id WHERE sw = ?
REPLACE into pushworks_trace value(?,?,?);
Lock pushworks_trace write;
UNLOCK pushworks_trace;
select * from topic where topicId=?
select * from groups where recommend=? order by createTime desc limit ?,?;
select reply.*, vp.creatorId, vp.description from reply INNER JOIN (select * from view_point where topicId=?) vp ON reply.replyId=vp.replyId order by reply.createTime desc limit ?,?;
SELECT reply.*,vp.creatorId,vp.description from reply INNER JOIN (select * from view_point where topicId=?) vp ON reply.replyId=vp.replyId ORDER BY reply.zanCount desc limit ?,?;
SELECT reply.*, vp.description, vp.creatorId FROM reply INNER JOIN (SELECT * from view_point where pointId=?) vp on reply.pointId=vp.pointId ORDER BY reply.zanCount desc LIMIT ?,?;
SELECT reply.*, vp.description, vp.creatorId FROM reply INNER JOIN (SELECT * from view_point where pointId=?) vp on reply.pointId=vp.pointId ORDER BY reply.createTime desc LIMIT ?,?;
SELECT reply.*,vp.creatorId,vp.description from reply INNER JOIN (select * from view_point where topicId=?) vp ON reply.replyId=vp.replyId ORDER BY reply.zanCount desc limit ?,?;
select * from evidence where creatorId=? and pointId=? limit ?,?;
select * from evidence where replyId=? limit ?,?;
select * from history_group where userId=? order by lastVisitTime desc limit ?,?;
replace into history_group values(?,?,?,?);
REPLACE into user_info(userId,openId, nick, icon, signature, name,sex,tel,weixinNum,weixinPic,createTime) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);

select groups.* from groups INNER JOIN (SELECT eg.* from event_group eg INNER JOIN (SELECT * from event_group where groupId = ?) ev ON eg.eventId=ev.eventId GROUP BY groupId) gl where groups.groupId=gl.groupId and groups.enable=1 and groups.groupId != ?;
select groups.* from groups INNER JOIN (SELECT * from event_group where eventId=?) eg ON eg.groupId=groups.groupId where groups.enable=1;
select reply.*,vp.description from reply INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM view_point where pointId=?) vp where reply.userId=?;
select rep.*,vp.description from view_point vp INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM reply where replyId=?) rep ON rep.pointId=vp.pointId;
SELECT * from reply_hot_req where replyId=? and userId=? and type=0;
SELECT * from reply_hot_req where replyId=? and userId=? and type=1;
update reply set zanCount=zanCount+? where replyId=?;
update reply set opposeCount=opposeCount+? where replyId=?;
select * from event;
select * from topic;
update topic set eventId = ? where topicId = ?;
select * from groups;
insert into event_group values(?,?);
delete from event_group where eventId = ? and groupId = ?;
select * from event_group, groups where event_group.groupId = groups.groupId and eventId = ?;
INSERT INTO reply(userId,pointId,topicId,createTime) VALUES(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE createTime=?;
